title: Blockchain-Based Land Record Management Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course aimed at strengthening job competencies for learners in student/job-seeker roles, considering intermediate-level domain expertise

learning_goals: Learners can explain blockchain fundamentals by connecting them to land record management systems
Learners can perform step-by-step land record abstraction procedures based on smart contracts
Learners can demonstrate practical processes for registering and verifying land records on blockchain platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
